website_summaries.verdict: A well-constructed 100% bamboo 3-piece steamer basket set that will hold up to repeated use.
pros: The tight-fitting and tightly-woven lid holds in heat and moisture well
The solid construction uses all 100% bamboo parts, including bamboo pegs and bamboo lacing, so there are no plastic or metal parts that could potentially leach toxic chemicals into your food
cons: Without the stainless steel reinforcing bands of some other models, this one may begin to come apart after multiple uses

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved this steamer when we first received it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this steamer when we first received it, until a couple of weeks ago. Unfortunately it is now falling apart. The part that holds the rack of the steamer in place has come completely out, and this is the part that the lid also attaches to. The 2 sections can no longer be safely stacked, and the lid only fits and stays on one section of the steamer, so instead of a double steamer we now only have a single steamer. Very disappointing... It is a great steamer, until it falls apart. 4 months seems way to soon for it to be already falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Could anyone explain if it is mẹ don't know how to use or this product isnt good? I'll try one more time
customer_reviews.text: After first use: the basket felt off the ring and then my food felt of the basket. Could anyone explain if it is mẹ don't know how to use or this product isnt good? I'll try one more time. If there is any other defective errors, I'll return.
customer_reviews.author: Khang Doan

customer_reviews.title: This steamer is like a silent cactus.  Works just fine but expect to have tiny bamboo stuck in your fingers.
customer_reviews.text: The steamer works fine but the quality is terrible. They are just like those cactus fruit. Looks inviting until you touch them. Ninja tiny needles for your fingers! I've so far used this steamer about 3 times within about 3-4 months and every time I touch the steamer, I get at least 2 splinters in my fingers. I guess you get what you paid for, this steamer is very cheap but that also means the bamboo aren't professionally crafted. You must wear gloves, or at least finger cots, if you are planning on even touching the steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Grapefruit Devil

customer_reviews.title: Invest
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy this to learn new cooking style in the kitchen. Making buns is truly the best using this equipment. I would recommend using parchment paper inside so the buns won’t stick (poke holes for steam). I also recommend getting the 2 tier version, it comes in handy. Haven’t use it to steam other food groups or veggies yet lolz. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: DavinG

customer_reviews.title: stinks like cheap chinese child sweat
customer_reviews.text: This steamer stinks of something horrible like sweat, diesel fumes, and I don't know what else. Washed it, steamed some water in it, washed it again, and it still made my food taste like industrial waste. Highly dislike, would strongly recommend you choose another product.
customer_reviews.author: computer guy steve

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good quality steamer but possible quality issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets and everything seemed fine but there appear to be some quality issues. One of them is falling apart (see picture) and the other basket warped somewhat so I have a bit of trouble getting them to stack properly. I could not find a way to get a hold of the seller, but will upgrade my review if they reach out to resolve this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Skory

customer_reviews.title: Want great steamed dumplings? Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to make home made dumplings for a long time and never imagined it could be this easy. This steamer worked outstanding, the dumplings were delicious and I can't wait to use it again. Two things I would recommend getting, one is the pot adapter, so you don't have to use a frying pan or worry about water in the pot running out. 2nd are the cotton liners to place the dumplings on. I don't like using cabbage leaves as I have seen here before because I detest the taste of cabbage. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Trovato

customer_reviews.title: Healthy cooking made easy
customer_reviews.text: I was never too appealed by steamed cooking, despite being an healthy eater Makes cooking steamed fish and vegetable very easy, and very quick Just use a large skillet with half and inch of water, and place on it the steamer. I use good quality and strong paper towel to separate my ingredient from the bamboo... keep in the steamer for 5-10min depending on the food... and there it is Goes in the dishwasher without any problem, and seems to be durable Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Steamer
customer_reviews.text: I love this bamboo steamer! It's so easy to use, and if you use premade bao buns, it can be used to make a super quick meal! My only issue with it was that there was a half-inch knick on the bottom, but it doesn't really affect how it works. I just got it recently, so I'll see how well it holds up, but for now, it works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: A. McK.

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy quality control.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had something positive to say about this item, but unfortunately I don't. When I received it, the bottom of one of the trays wasn't fitted properly and started to fall out when I put food in the tray. The other tray was perfectly fine. I exchanged the item and had the same exact problem with one of the trays in the second steamer. Otherwise, the steamer seems very well constructed. The fitting and quality control are just shoddy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size durability and makes food tastes good
customer_reviews.text: This is among a few of my favorite things. I love this bamboo steamer. My first one and also my first attempt at making Chinese dumplings or bao. This steamer is wonderful. Smells nice and earthy and food tastes yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken at 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: It makes great steam buns but broken at 2nd use. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Aroma_mama

customer_reviews.title: Everything I make in it steams very nicely. I made some wonderful cantonese fish and some ...
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is very well made. Everything I make in it steams very nicely. I made some wonderful cantonese fish and some shrimp wontons. I did not buy the ring, but rather used this in a wok filled with some water. I also can cut my own parchment paper and poke it with a toothpick instead of buying the sheets. Anything I forgot to rotate while cooking finished off fast at the end so there is a decent amount of steam that reaches the top layer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Quality not great
customer_reviews.text: Love this steamer basket, but very disappointed that it’s falling apart already and have only had it for 7 weeks. I use it maximum of 1-2 times per week. I care for it according to the instructions. For the price, I expected it to be better quality. The return window is only a couple weeks, which I now see why. There is also no way to contact vendor, which is too bad. For that reason I give it only 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Please do not publish my name

customer_reviews.title: Splinters
customer_reviews.text: I love the rawness of the product. It comes untreated. Also, beware of splinters. Wood splinters are on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Yuan

customer_reviews.title: A must have for people who enjoy steaming!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bamboo steamer, it is very well built and seems like it’ll be in the kitchen for quite some time! I’ve probably used it about 7/8 times so far to make different types of buns and I’ve also steamed vegetables in it. I always use the liners to make sure nothing gets stuck on the bamboo. (They can also be found on amazon for cheap)
customer_reviews.author: ZEK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bamboo Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Very good bamboo steamer basket! I am very pleased with the craftsmanship of the baskets. Just make sure to line the basket with cabbage or lettuce leaves before you steam dumplings in it. Otherwise they’ll stick!
customer_reviews.author: K^3

customer_reviews.title: Good Steamer
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a decent steamer for dumplings. Make sure you get the liner sheets though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean and it was dirty and smell when I received
customer_reviews.text: When I received it was so dirty and smell bad. One time use it’s hard to clean
customer_reviews.author: Ade Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Fits a little or a lot! Love the versatility!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I like the option of using 1 layer or all. Clean up is easy, especially when a liner is used. Good quality. Well made. Looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: TAMARA LUDINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Functional but extremely shoddy quality
customer_reviews.text: This bamboo steamer basket works, but that's just about the only thing positive about it. From the day I received it there were splinters coming out from multiple areas and that problem has only been exacerbated over time. I don't know how good the other bamboo steamer baskets that you can buy on Amazon are, but I can't imagine that they get any worse than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Soochan K.

customer_reviews.title: Looking good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, good quality, aging well and taking on just the right patina that steamed bamboo should have.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Lim

customer_reviews.title: Easy and food tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this steamer. I bought it to make baby food and it works great. I use it with the parchment liners, but you could certainly make your own. I place it on top of a perforated pizza pan on top of my 10 inch stock pot. I have steamed root vegetables, squash, peas, green beans, apples and pears. Plan to try steaming some fish soon. Steaming is fast, easy and maintains flavor and nutrients in your foods. I will definitely continue to use this in the future because the food from steaming is so flavorful.
customer_reviews.author: saluki3

customer_reviews.title: 2 sections not 5
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice unit. However, I made the mistake of assuming it had 5 stacks because of the bands on the image. Each section has two bands, so there's really only two sections. Other than that I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: GeoTagger

customer_reviews.title: Can’t stop using it
customer_reviews.text: I really live it, it is easy to use and clean. I cook veggies, meet and fish. It takes only 10minutes for the food to be steamed cook. It’s amazing and super healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Mommicchi Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great for dumplings and/or dim sum
customer_reviews.text: Great for making dim sum or dumplings. My family always looks forward to it. Product is sturdy and comes exactly as described. It is a good idea to get some extra basket liner sheets though
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Siopoa came out perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is beautiful! I used it to make siapoa or boa and it made beautiful fluffy stuffed buns.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Large make sure you have a big enough skillet to boil water in
customer_reviews.text: They're great, however they're very large ensure you have a skillet big enough to heat water to generate steam.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Durable Bamboo & Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This steamer was nicely woven and you can tell if was made out of quality bamboo. It seems pretty durable. You can use it has a single steamer or as a double steamer which comes in handy. I would recommend this product for anyone in the market for a steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Good steamers
customer_reviews.text: This was my first set of steamers and they are exactly what I was expecting. They sit nicely on to of the pot, although I think there is an adapter you can add to the pot to make it sit even better, but you don't have to have that to use these. They are easy to clean and are large enough to steam tons of veggies at once.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I’m very partial to bamboo cooking products, and this was a wish list gift for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Manong Ric

customer_reviews.title: I love this steamer
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer. It steams everything evenly and quickly. Be sure to use either the liners or parchment paper or items will stick. Also be sure to dry it off after use to prevent mold. Love it and will be buying a few more for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: Trishakers

customer_reviews.title: Works great and roomy
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this. I have cooked many vegetables and bigger portions of fish. I can cook a couple of things at once.
customer_reviews.author: D. Elsen

customer_reviews.title: Authentic and old fashioned. Much better than metallic steamers.
customer_reviews.text: Is as exactly as advertised. Double levels allow for more cooking quantity. Use some cooking spray on the steamer and you won’t need to buy the paper sheets. You will also get more accurate cooking time without the wax paper inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Jordon Pfannenbecker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic steamer, worth every penny over and over again, will recomend, well built solid, fits each other sweet..
customer_reviews.author: Straight

customer_reviews.title: Nice one!
customer_reviews.text: Used it only once, but liked it a lot. Hope, it will last long time!
customer_reviews.author: Ksana

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo steamer
customer_reviews.text: I've used this twice already since yesterday to make steamed buns. I bought the rim to go under it so I could use it on my stock pot. It works wonderfully with no issues. I'd recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney D.

customer_reviews.title: We used it this morning!
customer_reviews.text: We made Siopao this morning and glad we had this... Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: EsteeC

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I can usually steam some pasta,which is very convenient to use
customer_reviews.author: Karen Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Veggies!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why but the veggies are so much greener and tender than they are when I use a normal metal steamer. I LOVE this product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Green

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: the base seperated from the ring after 3-4 uses, very poor build quality
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dumplings
customer_reviews.text: Dumplings come out perfect with this steamer. Although you can buy special paper so the dumplings don't stick, I used lettuce and it worked just fine. I recommend getting Helen Chen's Steaming Ring so you can place it right on your pot.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Not well made. The handle on the lid broke ...
customer_reviews.text: Not well made. The handle on the lid broke off as I was reading the instructions. Didn't even had a chance to remove the wrapping. What an inconvenience. I now have to package it up and drop it off at the post office. Will be buying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and well used with all types of food. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: E. Barz

customer_reviews.title: Nice item!
customer_reviews.text: Getting some basket liners will make your dimsum experience a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Maisha Maliha Hoque

customer_reviews.title: Best Sweet Potatoes ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! First time using a steamer like this , I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: I've read elsewhere that you want to steam these once or twice without food. The first time doing so the racks the food would sit on tried their hardest to fall out. I was able to push them back into place with some effort but still, not a promising start.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for steaming dumplings
customer_reviews.text: These are really well made. Perfect for steaming dumplings. I also use it to make soft or hard boiled eggs in the shell. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Palouse

customer_reviews.title: ... received imparted an off taste and oder but they happily replaced it and it is a fine steamer
customer_reviews.text: First one I received imparted an off taste and oder but they happily replaced it and it is a fine steamer. Well crafted, with proper care it will last years.
customer_reviews.author: james l.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I love it. Easy to use and clean. Comes with a few recipes.
customer_reviews.author: kdefant12

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and seems like great quality. Very large so it can hold a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Can't complain about the quality, looks solid and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: NBSG

customer_reviews.title: great steamer, great price.
customer_reviews.text: it's a great steamer and high quality. good price. very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, and looks great, tight enough to keep in steam, and smells great when steaming. Bamboo is the way to go, and Helen Chen makes good stuff for a budget conscious buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick P.

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I do not satisfied with the quality,they should double check before delivery it!
customer_reviews.author: julie lee

customer_reviews.title: bamboo steamer basket
customer_reviews.text: looks well made and appealing - it was packaged carefully - I am giving it as a gift to a fellow who was struggling recently to steam some dumplings -
customer_reviews.author: GF here

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best construction of those we have purchased. Nice find. Will purchase again when needing replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: ... used it a number of time and works way better than the metal steamer I have
customer_reviews.text: Already used it a number of time and works way better than the metal steamer I have.Have had no issues with sticking or anything. Contains the steam very well. Don't bother with the liners, just use some parchment paper; NEVER wax as this will melt.
customer_reviews.author: A_Stickel

customer_reviews.title: I would still like to know how to use it!!!
customer_reviews.text: No instructions on how to use, not even for simple foods like dumplings or rice.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Reid

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Two stars only because it fell apart too soon, I live in a very dry climate and that could have something to do with why it came apart.
customer_reviews.author: Keith G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bamboo steamer to make Bao. This is perfect. I am able to use it with skillet as I don't own a wok. Absolutely love it and recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: The Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Cuts down on coking time after steaming my veggies.
customer_reviews.author: WorldPeace

customer_reviews.title: Better food warmer
customer_reviews.text: Better and healthier way to warm up food vs microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Radcliffe Flores

customer_reviews.title: Love my steamer
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer . I'm diabetic and steaming veggies work great
customer_reviews.author: Semurphy

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would use this as often as I do. Great for steaming tamales.
customer_reviews.author: Llemarra

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this because now I can make my steamed buns the right way. It is great.
customer_reviews.author: Unicornhal

customer_reviews.title: A Happy Mom!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son. He uses bamboo steamers for everything!! His last one fell apart from so much use. I checked in with him on this one and he loves it!! There were many to choose from online and I wanted to be sure I got one that wasn't junk. My son is happy, so I picked a good one!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well put together, just used it and worked perfectly I am very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Darius C.

customer_reviews.title: i love
customer_reviews.text: Used it already for siomai and works well... i love it
customer_reviews.author: JOHN B

customer_reviews.title: worth the money for sure
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this steamer in the 4 for 3 promotion, and am very pleased, well made, if you use the liners, and clean after each use, it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Bela

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy quality, much better than the one I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy quality, much better than the one I bought from Walmart, I don't recall its name brand. I'm very happy with this Helen Chens model.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace Dufrene

customer_reviews.title: Good, versatile steamer.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for dim sum, veggies, fish, and lot of other stuff. It's held up better than I expected. It hasn't warped a bit. It also doesn't look bad as a serving dish on the kitchen table ;)
customer_reviews.author: L.D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Construction is not 100% consistant. The first time I ordered it it came with a broken/missing handle on top. The new one has an extra wide gap in one of the trays but not enough to be a real problem so I will keep it. Does its job and I am happy with it. Looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Christina S.

customer_reviews.title: This was the best match I can find
customer_reviews.text: I need a steamer for my dumplings. This was the best match I can find. Quality is fine but I found some one at local market. The price is about same
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We made shumai this week and they turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: Gia DeHart

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: I am so surprised at how many times we have used the steamer since we purchased it. I never knew I needed one - but now consider it an essential cooking tool.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Works better than I expected. Plan to be eating healthier meals and lose some weight. Recommend this highly to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: rebeca.madrid

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The whole thing fell apart when opened the amazon box. Didn't look like because of the packaging, but the original box was missing. Maybe someone returned it, and Amazon didn't check, and sent it out like that. Returned it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Wing Foo Wong

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, after first use, the bamboo warped!!! Now the bottom isn't flat. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: not so impressed yet
customer_reviews.text: the lid was pushed in when I pulled it out of the box...I soaked it and "repaired it" the best I could (losing a few pieces of bamboo insert in the process) because I didn't want the hassle of returning it and I'm hoping that when my daughter uses it, it will work...skeptical, will not purchase from here again. I listed as "ok" ... I won't really know until use.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: A very good steamer
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is very well made. It is very easy to use and the metal tray under it makes it so easy to put in on my saucepans. It is very easy to clean as well. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: SHULA BURROWS

customer_reviews.title: Not as well made as expected
customer_reviews.text: It's great for steaming, but hard to clean. Bits of food get stuck along the bottom under the sides. This size is very large and requires a huge pan for steaming.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: this is a bit to large but steams really great.
customer_reviews.text: I have a small steamer and wanted a larger one, this is a bit to large but steams really great.
customer_reviews.author: robbin purcell

customer_reviews.title: quick delivery easy transaction
customer_reviews.text: havent used it yet but quality appears to be good, and can't wait to use it will update a negative comment if I find it was not worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: dena

customer_reviews.title: Would rather pay more for higher quality
customer_reviews.text: The one I received had the micro-splinter problem that other reviewers complain about: lots of tiny splinters every time I touched it. Overall the quality was low and the lid did not fit snugly. I bought this because I love when restaurants serve dim sum in bamboo steamers, but this did not bring me the same joy due to its low quality. I returned this one and will be looking for a more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: SergeiS

customer_reviews.title: This girl stinks
customer_reviews.text: Works well(kinda hard to mess up steam) but man this thing smells. Good for cooking or keeping your cat off the counters
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Works great, strong wood odor though
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as expected. Has a strong wood odor the first time we used it. Can't use dish soap or put in dishwasher or the wood will absorb the soap and it will leech into your food and effect the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: James Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is pretty low, very smelly also. There are many steamers from other sellers that are a few dollars cheaper than from Helen Chen, but I have bought Helen Chen products before so I trust this brand. But this steamer is definitely not something I would expect from Helen Chen.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Z.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made!! Should last for quite awhile. Great to use for steaming Chinese dumplings or anything that needs to be steamed!! I suggest the circular liners for the bottom of the steamers. They will prevent any dumplings from sticking to the bottoms and will make clean up a breeze!!! Buy the stainless ring which will allow you to place your bamboo steamer on a pot of boiling water !!
customer_reviews.author: John E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, all the other brands are just as bad
customer_reviews.text: If you really need a bamboo steamer, realize that any unit you buy will need repairs, which you will have to do. If you send it back, they'll send you another that will also need repairs. It doesn't matter what brand you buy. The only solution is to buy two or more.
customer_reviews.author: ITCS

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Nice that this steamer has two levels. It works perfectly nestled int a standard size wok and cleans easily, particularly if you use a layer of parchment or banana leaf under your food.
customer_reviews.author: Sumer Mishue

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these while stationed in Hawaii. Got lost among the moves. This one is perfect. Big enough. Sturdy. Easy. Affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Helene Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 5 months of infrequent use
customer_reviews.text: Well, I should have read some of the reviews. Purchased in Feb 2018. Lasted 5 months and now the bamboo grid is falling out of one of the trays making that one useless. I now have a single tray steamer but that's not what I purchased. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: ml88ct

customer_reviews.title: I love this steamer basket
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer basket. I am a fan of finding a way to cook quicker, cleaner and better for you. That being said I would say that safety is key to any style of cooking. Don't be over anxious and lift the steamer baskets off the heat too quickly.( while the bamboo baskets are hot, the deadly part is the STEAM, that is built up under the baskets.) I recommend having something like this towel above to protect you and your hands. Steam can cause some of the worst burns out there.
customer_reviews.author: B L

customer_reviews.title: Lid didn't fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: The lid did not fit. You would think they would have checked that before sending it to me. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful steamer. Very sturdy and well made. I've used It countless times and it still looks almost new. It fits perfectly over my biggest pot, or any of my woks. If you're using it over a pot that is a smaller diameter than the steamer and cooking with gas be careful not to turn the flame up too high and burn it (it's made of bamboo after all.) Mine got a little scorched on one side but it still works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: sophia ozer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this.....
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this, but sadly, the bamboo smelled really bad and made my dumplings taste really bad. It's not for me.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynnTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use round parchment sheets with holes to keep clean. Available on Amazon. We love potstickers and make them often. Great for veggies too.
customer_reviews.author: Dargriff

customer_reviews.title: forlorn
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly but the merchandise came to me a bit forlorn. I will attempt to use it and pray it does not fall apart too soon. sucks when you are sent things you want to send back but its just too much of a hassle, to bad its a simple product and should be checked before shipped to the consumer
customer_reviews.author: Imcrzy4h2o

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my sister, because she likes to make dumplings. We've had it for over a year, it's still in great condition!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn Blanck

product_meta.title: Helen Chen's Asian Kitchen 10" Bamboo Steamer Basket
product_meta.description:
Easily steam vegetables, meats, seafood and more with this two tiered bamboo steamer with lid from Helen Chen's Asian Kitchen. This steamer features a sturdy two tiered bamboo design for long lasting durability. Attractive, lightweight, and harvested from a responsible, constantly replenished resource, bamboo is an ideal material for durability and versatility. Steamers accentuate the natural flavor of foods and retain the nutrients and vitamins while cooking with less fat and oil. Use the small steamer baskets as individual serving pieces right at the table. The steamer is designed to sit over another pot containing boiling water. As the water boils, the steam enters the steamer through the open slats in the bottom and is contained in the steamer by the lid. The bamboo steamer absorbs any condensation, keeping water from dripping back onto the food. When heated, it forms a hot container and, with the cover in place, can keep food warm for up to half an hour. This two tiered bamboo steamer with lid from Helen Chen's Asian Kitchen is the perfect addition to any kitchen.

10" diameter x 7-1/2" H

AMAZON.COM
An authentic tool for steaming vegetables and meats or serving dim sum at the table, this steamer from Helen Chen's Asian Kitchen line is crafted from tightly woven bamboo. In addition to being a sustainable material, bamboo is an effective steaming material because it traps steam, absorbs condensation, and retains heat. Here, the 100 percent natural bamboo slats are hand-woven into a layered cylindrical basket with a tightly constructed lid and secured with bamboo pegs. Tidy and attractive, the unit rests over a wok or, with a steaming ring, on a pot of boiling water to cook without fat or cumbersome equipment. Measuring 10 inches in diameter, the steamer is handcrafted, and detergent-free washing by hand is recommended. An instruction booklet with recipes is included. --Emily Bedard
feature_bullets: Bamboo is heat and stain resistant
Bamboo is less absorbent than wood making tool easier to clean and easier to keep sanitary
Harvested from a responsible, constantly replenished resource
Can also be used as an individual serving piece right at the table
